string-array.name: messages
string-array.item: May I come in, sir?
Come in please….. have a seat.
Thanks.
Please tell us something about you.
I passed 12th from CBSE with 75% marks. Now I am pursuing B.A. from Delhi University. I am also doing a part time job as a computer operator. My hobbies are watching cricket and listening to music.
Where are you working?
I am working at the office of a Chartered Accountant in CP.
How much salary are you taking?
Rs.30000/- per month.
Why do you want to leave that job?
Firstly it is a part time job and I want to do a full time job. Secondly I am not interested in accounting.
You are doing graduation. How will you be able to do a full time job?
I am doing graduation through correspondence. Therefore I would be able to do a full time job.
Why do you want to join a call centre?
I like to talk to others. Moreover, career prospectus are bright in a big company. Talent is valued here.
Cricket is one of your hobbies. Now tell me, who is better batsman – Sehwag or Brian Lara?
In my opinion Lara is more experienced and a better batsman.
Which type of music do you like to listen to?
I enjoy both classical and pop music.
Why do Punjabi pop songs are more popular in India than songs of any other Indian language?
They are melodious and foot-tapping.
Who is your favourite family member?
My father is my favourite.
Why is he your favourite?
He is hard-working and wise. Now and then he sits with us and gives friendly guidance.
If you are made the chief minister of Delhi what would be your first two steps?
To remove illegal encroachments from the city and ensure parking places in each colony.
And if you become God for one day tell us one thing you would like to do.
To create a new world without violence.
How many buttons does your shirt have?
Sorry sir, I never counted them.
When did Akbar the great land on moon?
Actually he never landed on moon. He was Emperor of India, a great mogul.
What is your weak point?
Eating spicy food.
What is the main strength of your personality?
The ability to talk to any person without hesitation.
Where do you see yourself after five years?
Working in your company at a senior position.
Speak a few sentences on ‘a bunch of ripe bananas’.
It reflects a healthy and zestful life.
Something more
It also fills us with a feeling of togetherness.
Something more
A spirit of cooperation among employees makes them more useful and valuable.
If we work in a team we become very cooperative. Therefore join hands and move forward with confidence.
I am impressed with your answers.
Thanks sir
Would you like to have your appointment letter just now and join the company from the first of coming month.
Definitely. Thanking you a lot for giving me an opportunity to work with the company.
